title: Why Anthropic Bought Bun, a High-Speed Runtime to Power Claude Tools and Dev Agents
description: What happens when a innovative AI research company acquires one of the fastest JavaScript runtimes on the market? The tech world is abuzz with the news that Anthropic has acquired Bun, a move that could reshape the landscape of AI-driven software development.…
